Text: ENJOY Man on a Ledge 2012 R5 New Source with AC3 5.1 HQ by CM8!
Excellent audio and video. No sync problems noted either. Good job.

Great quality!! Thanx mate so much!

+1

V=10
A=5, diminished & hollow sounding
Thanks for the upload.

A = 9 / Not as crisp and treble like as a proper DVDRip...But still very clear to hear.

V = 9 / Dark areas of the film are slightly strengthened...does not ruin the movie AT ALL !!

M = 8 / He may not be fighting Mythical Gods...but Sam Worthington still kicks ass !

Thanks HeroMaster for the upload...and to the Seeders.
